snippet.title: We nearly MISSED OUT on iOS7 redesign: But someone snatched Jony Ive from the jaws of quit
snippet.description:
We nearly MISSED OUT on iOS7 redesign: But someone snatched Jony Ive from the jaws of quit
Apple design chief Jony Ive almost quit his industrial design course, it has been revealed, meaning that in a parallel universe Apple iStuff would have looked a bit less... like this. In an interview with The Telegraph, designer Tom Karen revealed that Ive's father had approached him with a dilemma about his errant young son. " …
Jasper Hamill, 21 Feb 2014

snippet.title: Qipp debuts 'Clippy for your STUFF' app
snippet.description:
Qipp debuts 'Clippy for your STUFF' app
It looks like it's time to oil your bike chain. Would you like to 1) check warranty instructions 2) just oil it already and/or 3) check if the kids' bikes need attention? A new mobile app called Qipp aims to help you organise your life by putting all of your possessions into a database. You enter details of your things such as …
Simon Rockman, 10 Feb 2014
